hoemAbout: We would like to introduce you to a new, fun, and easy way of learning. Educate your child in a fun way by playing games, interacting with visuals, and chatting with others. We have created many games, and visuals for your child to excel in their learning.
homeDesc: LearnEasy is a web app where you can:
homePt1: Make education fun for children online
homePt3: Broaden the knownledge skills of the users
homePt4: Broaden the amount of users, have a different language option
